metadata.title: CVE-2024-42162 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:gve: Account for stopped queues when reading NIC statsWe now account for the fact that the NIC might send us stats for asubset of queues. Without this change, gve_get_ethtool_stats might makean invalid access on the priv->stats_report->stats array.

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
